abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews third night of performances from A Prize Every Time, 4-day improvisational dance series led by choreographer Sally Silvers, at Roulette theater in Brooklyn.
snippet: In the choreographer Sally Silvers’s “Prize Every Time” at Roulette in Brooklyn, performers had 30 minutes to create something and enact it.
lead_paragraph: In the choreographer Sally Silvers’s “Prize Every Time” at Roulette in Brooklyn, performers had 30 minutes to create something and enact it.

headline.main: A Performance From Soup to Nuttiness
headline.print_headline: A Performance From Soup to Nuttiness
headline.seo: Sally Silvers’s ‘Prize Every Time’ at Roulette — Review
